'''1.0.7''' was an update to ''[[Pocket Edition]]'' and [[:Category:Bedrock_Edition|its derived editions]] that added the Fallout Mash-up pack.<ref name=minecraft.net/><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004168671|title=MCPE/WIN 10/Gear VR - 1.0.7}}</ref>

== Additions ==
'''[[Mash-up Pack]]'''
* Added the Fallout Mash-up pack.

'''[[Painting]]s'''
* [[File:Wither (painting texture) JE1 BE1.png|64px]] Added the "Wither" painting.{{check version|According to [[Painting#History]]}}

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Resource pack]]'''
* Added a warning if cannot find the textures list file.

== Fixes ==
* {{bug|MCPE-18027}} The [[Wither]] is now one of the [[painting]]s that are obtainable
* Fixed a crash that happened when a mob effect that doesn't exist is applied to a melee attack using [[Add-on]].
* Fixed the screen getting cut-off on smaller screens for the Redstone Mansion store description.
* [[TNT]] no longer does damage to a player if the TNT is in water.
* {{bug|MCPE-20582}} Fixed several skins on the Festive Mash-up pack that appeared corrupted.
* {{bug|MCPE-20369}} After a world with a texture/resource pack is uploaded to a Realm, the texture/resource pack is again displayed correctly.
** This also fixes the [[health]] & [[hunger bar]]s
* {{bug|MCPE-12347}} Crashes shouldn't cause you to lose a lot of your progress anymore.
* Fixed the [[quartz slab]] in the Candy texture pack.
* [[Minecart]]s no longer bounce indefinitely on [[slime block]]s.
